lines.text: Where is the strangest place you, personally, have had the urge to make whoopee? Olga?
Lying flat on my stomach, watching television...
Gentlemen, what is your favorite part of our brand new Newlywed Game set?
I'd have to say wife number three.
What is the nearest delicatessen to your house?
The nearest delicatessen? Let's see, that would be Yama-Shaba.
That's not a delicatessen, that's a restaurant! A delicatessen is a drugstore.
What? Baby, I don't know about you...
